text: While this game wasn't the BEST, it was definitely GOOD, don't get me wrong, it nailed the genre, but the title theme is just SO good. It's peaceful, yet envokes a touch of sadness, and it's just so well composed. I could sleep to it.

text: Hey, recently I've been working on a lo fi version of this song. I don't really have any tools for this; except for my keyboard. I can't really read sheet music so this video has, and still is helping me a lot, let it be when I'm trying to mimic the notes, or whenever I'm sad. I thank you for posting this, and I hope the rest your days are good

text:
Well, for those who say it’s overrated, it’s obvious that if you see it at this point it may look like that, but you have to remember that this was the first game that tried a lot of things. When you played it in that time it was all fresh, all anew. I’m so grateful for that experience... I feel so lucky... Who knows when other generation will have the opportunity to experience that...
OOT and Mario 64 made the foundations of a whole generation of games to come.

text: This game was amazing. I remember playing it when I was like, 3-4. I thought, "This music is amazing". At age 8, I was a gamecube fanatic, and my gamecube broke. :( So I went to put my gamecube away, and I found my N64 next to the garbage. My mother said I didn't use it, so she would throw it away. So I picked my N64, and still in the actual system, was my freaking LoZ OoT. Nostalgia hit me. HARD. =D I'm 14, and I'll never forget the N64. Never.

author: eishikibahamut

text:
Another contender for a x00 theme!

I'm wondering, is it really worth it to get this game on the 3DS? I mean, for all the gamers who already played this game before, they probably already possess it. Is it just for a reason to play the game again? On my part, if I wanted to play it again, I'll just pop-up my N64 cart, and play on my tv. Improved graphics? Ok, maybe...

I assume this re-release is meant for younger players that didn't have the chance to play it, which would be an honorable goal.

text:
@fingrid We will always have the original soundtrack in the original game. I'm a musician myself and I really like when they remake music, sometimes they make the songs even more impressive and epic, and sometimes they fail.
Just adding to the quality of the classic ones would make me happy, but re-using the original OST isn't ok
